issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When creating load balancers I am seeing these exceptions logged before the servo instance reaches running state.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus-load-balancer-image
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 1.0.4
Release     : 0.189.140401gitdfcc238.el6

Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.0
Release     : 0.0.819.20140404git4fac1b55.el6

{code}
2014-04-04 19:04:55  WARN 000008037 dBalancingBackendService | failed to find loadbalancer for servo instance: i-6d287af6
com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.backend.LoadBalancingException: IP address (10.111.102.43) not match with record (null-null)

fields.summary: failed to find loadbalancer for servo and invalid servo request

comments.body: This is not a functional issue (I believe), but the logging issue that manifests short period of time. Easy to fix.

Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.0
Release     : 0.0.909.20140421gitb5966fda.el6

Messages no longer shown when loadbalancer is craeted and/or servo instances are started
